name: Silksong spoiler blocker for youtube
description:
Silksong spoiler blocker for youtube is an extension, that blocks video thumbnails and titles from potentially spoiling you the indie title Hollow Knight: Silksong.
It works by scanning video titles on currently opened youtube page and checking whether they contain some keywords from the blacklist.
This extension **DOES NOT** stop you from opening these videos, watching already opened videos or shorts and does not prevent you from previouing video by hovering your cursor over a video.
